General.Name: Optima Prima Metal Sinergi
General.Description: PT Optima Prima Metal Sinergi Tbk engages in the metal scrap trading activities in Indonesia. It engages in the supply of steel plates from used ships to steel manufacturers; and offers metal scrap raw materials. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Surabaya, Indonesia. PT Optima Prima Metal Sinergi Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Asian Perkasa Indosteel.
General.Address: Jl. Margomulyo Permai Blok AC-10, Surabaya, Indonesia
